Description:
Ribbety Frog is an interesting motorised toy, that possess the characterstic movement of a frog.

It is made with a combination of joinery  methods: mortise-tenon connections, motorised and simple fixation of outer body parts with screws and other accessories.

All the materials are present in the self build kit, escept the batttery which is to be placed in the holder space given.

An eco friendly toy that is designed to encourage and support the curiousity of child. The working of Ribbety Frog explains the concept of motion through 3D model for better understanding and application as well.
Meta Description: Ribbety Frog is a realistic fun frog in a form of toy that explains the movement of frog through simple gears.
Short Description: A realistic fun frog in a form of a toy that explains the movement of the frog through simple gears. It helps in a better understanding of phases and opportunities to modify the movement as well. The Ribbety Frog is a perfect gift for kids and adults alike! Have fun and take pride in creating a working model, gluelessly, without any hassle. Get yourself the mysterious puzzle-solving kit of Ribbety Frog today!

Description:
Tellurian Orrery is a thrilling piece that explains solar systems by inculcating the motive within simple components.

It's is made up of minimal components that resultants into a circular model with the most basic and important elements for exploration of space phenomena like eclipses.

All the components, including replicas of Sun, Earth, and Moon are present in the self-build kit. Nothing is to be brought and fixed externally.

A solar system-related scientific model to encourage brainstorming notions in a child. It works on the concept of rotation, revolution, and a part of the solar system as well.
Meta Description: The Tellurian Orrery is a perfectly practical and accurate model explaining the interrelation among the motions of Earth, Sun, and Moon. It eases out all the hard work of remembering the complexities of space science as you can see everything happening realistically in front of you!
Short Description: It is a perfectly practical and accurate model explaining the interrelation among the motions of Earth, Sun, and Moon; exploring why, when, and how the solar/ lunar eclipse occurs. It eases out all the hard work of remembering the complexities of space science as you can see everything happening realistically in front of you! The Tellurian Orrery is a perfect gift for kids and adults alike! Have fun and take pride in creating a working model, gluelessly, without any hassle. Description: The number blocks are designed such that two 1s equals 2 and two 2s equals 4 and so on. Kids as well as adults can tinker together as they navigate their way through numbers, basic operations and all the way to fractions. All you gotta do is stack them up and answers appear right in front of your eyes!

Description:
At quite an early age, kids start grasping words but only verbally. This board is an ingenious way to allow your kid to make and spell words by trial and error rather than spoon-feeding them the correct spellings.

You teach your kids to count orally and that is their first meet-n-greet with numbers. When the time comes to introduce them to what numbers look like, they can now use their previous knowledge by counting the unit blocks and stacking different numbers next to the blocks to arrive at new learning.
